replies.body:
This mode was fun but it has potential to be better. I think this mode could evolve into a "PVE mode" or "Co-op Arcarde Mode" for casual players who just want to have fun. For example, add 4 more maps to this one mode with each map having new enemies, and each map has a boss to beat. But that is just my opinion, take it or leave it. 

I don't agree with missions however. I think the player should not be forced to beat onslaught mode with classes that are not to their liking. It makes playing this mode a chore. Maybe beating Onslaught mode once should be reward enough.

I am already too tired of the summoners rift. I don't like being under the pressure of the other players over the top standards. With a Co-op mode, I have more room to be experimental and I think other players are more forgiving of my mistakes compared to PVP.
This event was garbage thank god
